channel.title: Projects on Carlos Kelaidis
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Carlos Kelaidis

item.title: Project 3: Time Series Analysis of Crude Oil Prices
item.description: Project done in R Optimized a range of models, accounting for seasonality and non-constant variance in the data, in order to most accurately predict future crude oil prices, particularly post-covid Github Project Repository

item.title: Project 2: Covid-19 BERT Sentiment Analysis
item.description: Project done in Python using Pytorch BERT tokenizer: BertTokenizer (‘bert-base-uncased’) BERT model: BertForSequenceClassification Trained on 2 epochs, a batch size of 16, a learning rate of 2e-5 and epsilon of 1e-8 Github Project Repository

item.title: Project 1: Heart Disease Prediction
item.description: Project done in R Created a tool that classifies patients as having heart disease based on their health data, this way people can see how their health status is with regards to having having heart disease Performed a Best Subset Selection to further determine significant variables, evaluating model sizes and their performances through Cp, BIC, Adjusted-R2 and Cross-Validation Error Optimized a Logistic Regression, KNN with K = 5, LDA, Lasso, SVM and a Random Forest choosing the tuning parameters through Cross-Validation Github Project Repository
